articles.title: AI will be more disruptive than COVID. Which party can seize the moment?
articles.summary: If the artificial intelligence boom happens while President Trump is in office, he'll be blamed for the loss of millions of middle-class jobs. But will Democrats offer a vision for a new workforce?
articles.translated_title: AI will be more disruptive than COVID. Which party can seize the moment?
articles.translated_summary: If the artificial intelligence boom happens while President Trump is in office, he'll be blamed for the loss of millions of middle-class jobs. But will Democrats offer a vision for a new workforce?

articles.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman Reveals 'Sci-Fi' AI Companion Vision With Ex-Apple Design Chief Jony Ive To Replace Smartphones
articles.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman detailed his vision for an artificial intelligence companion device during a recent podcast appearance.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman Reveals 'Sci-Fi' AI Companion Vision With Ex-Apple Design Chief Jony Ive To Replace Smartphones
articles.translated_summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman detailed his vision for an artificial intelligence companion device during a recent podcast appearance.

articles.title: Meta AI App Has Persistent Flaws Months After Debut
articles.summary: The Meta AI app offers an uneven experience, posing a sharp contrast to Mark Zuckerberg’s lofty artificial intelligence ambitions.
articles.translated_title: Meta AI App Has Persistent Flaws Months After Debut
articles.translated_summary: The Meta AI app offers an uneven experience, posing a sharp contrast to Mark Zuckerberg’s lofty artificial intelligence ambitions.

articles.title: Indigenous knowledge meets artificial intelligence
articles.summary: These contemporary Native artists are reimagining relationships between technology, memory, and resistance.
articles.translated_summary: These contemporary Native artists are reimagining relationships between technology, memory, and resistance.

articles.title: Top exec reveals the ‘stupidest thing’ companies adopting AI can do
articles.summary: The president of Cisco rejects the doomsday warnings from some tech leaders that artificial intelligence will make entry-level jobs vanish.
articles.translated_title: Top exec reveals the ‘stupidest thing’ companies adopting AI can do

articles.title: 'Godfather Of AI' Geoffrey Hinton Warns Bots Could Seek Power, Urges Giving Them 'Maternal Instinct' To Protect Humans
articles.summary: Geoffrey Hinton, dubbed the "Godfather of AI," warned that artificial intelligence systems will inevitably develop power-seeking behaviors.
articles.translated_title: 'Godfather Of AI' Geoffrey Hinton Warns Bots Could Seek Power, Urges Giving Them 'Maternal Instinct' To Protect Humans

articles.title: Eli Lilly Strikes $1.3 Billion Deal With Superluminal To Develop AI-Driven Obesity Drugs
articles.summary: Eli Lilly and Co (NYSE: LLY) has entered into a $1.3 billion deal with Superluminal Medicines to develop small-molecule drugs through artificial intelligence (AI) to treat obesity and other cardiometabolic diseases.
articles.translated_title: Eli Lilly Strikes $1.3 Billion Deal With Superluminal To Develop AI-Driven Obesity Drugs
articles.translated_summary: Eli Lilly and Co (NYSE: LLY) has entered into a $1.3 billion deal with Superluminal Medicines to develop small-molecule drugs through artificial intelligence (AI) to treat obesity and other cardiometabolic diseases.

articles.title: Australian Lawyer Apologizes for AI-Generated Errors in Murder Case
articles.summary: MELBOURNE, Australia (AP) — A senior lawyer in Australia has apologized to a judge for filing submissions in a murder case that included fake quotes and non-existent case judgments generated by artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Australian Lawyer Apologizes for AI-Generated Errors in Murder Case
articles.translated_summary: MELBOURNE, Australia (AP) — A senior lawyer in Australia has apologized to a judge for filing submissions in a murder case that included fake quotes and non-existent case judgments generated by artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Powerful new AI models knock the wind out of European adopter stocks
articles.summary: A rout in shares of European companies embracing artificial intelligence deepened this week, as powerful new AI models raise questions about whether sectors from software to data analytics could find themselves overtaken by the technology.
articles.translated_title: Powerful new AI models knock the wind out of European adopter stocks
